blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

summary: blow a kiss, fire a gun
title: blow a kiss, fire a gun
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DmFQtB

by The General Phanboy (panicked_introvert)

“If I don’t improve… he’ll absolutely obliterate me. And there’s nothing I can do to stop him.” Secret Agent “Gold,” or Dan Howell, is less than thrilled when he is forced to team up with new recruit “Amethyst,” Phil Lester. Phil is a former trainee; clumsy and overly apologetic, while Dan’s six years of experience have left him skilled and stealthy, yet completely emotionless. Throughout their mission to bring a mysterious super-villain to justice while travelling the city of Tokyo, Phil tries to come to terms with his illogical fear of Dan, while realising what Dan’s true intentions with him are.

/sorry if this description sucks ass :)/

Words: 2245, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, Tyler Oakley
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Spies & Secret Agents, Enemies to Friends to Lovers, Enemies to Friends, Friends to Lovers


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DmFQtB

blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: The last sentence in the DH shop newsletter legit just made me cry, I've missed that boy.

summary: now that the shops and their careers are separated without a word from dan and phil I think we can safely assume that this...
question: now that the shops and their careers are separated without a word from dan and phil I think we can safely assume that this “future” they talked about is one where they don’t care what we think. I’m not upset about the separation- they’ve alluded to this since ii was introduced and have been “giving us what we want” as a last hurrah but I don’t like having to assume everything . This would be a great time for them to have solo live shows and explain to the audience what they are thinking
answer: The thing is, people think that Dan and Phil “separating” their brands and doing their own thing means the end of the world. That’s it, it’s over, they’re moving to opposite ends of the country and getting restraining orders and they hate each other. But that’s obviously not the case. We’re still going to see Dan, and Phil, and danandphil. I think we’re just going to see more of a 2014-2015 esque style of uploading. Where they focus primarily on their own channels and their own solo content, with the occasional collab thrown into the mix. (And the gaming channel, assuming it comes back, and stays a gaming channel.)

reblog.comment: The thing is, people think that Dan and Phil “separating” their brands and doing their own thing means the end of the world. That’s it, it’s over, they’re moving to opposite ends of the country and getting restraining orders and they hate each other. But that’s obviously not the case. We’re still going to see Dan, and Phil, and danandphil. I think we’re just going to see more of a 2014-2015 esque style of uploading. Where they focus primarily on their own channels and their own solo content, with the occasional collab thrown into the mix. (And the gaming channel, assuming it comes back, and stays a gaming channel.)

trail.content_raw: The thing is, people think that Dan and Phil “separating” their brands and doing their own thing means the end of the world. That’s it, it’s over, they’re moving to opposite ends of the country and getting restraining orders and they hate each other. But that’s obviously not the case. We’re still going to see Dan, and Phil, and danandphil. I think we’re just going to see more of a 2014-2015 esque style of uploading. Where they focus primarily on their own channels and their own solo content, with the occasional collab thrown into the mix. (And the gaming channel, assuming it comes back, and stays a gaming channel.)
trail.content: The thing is, people think that Dan and Phil “separating” their brands and doing their own thing means the end of the world. That’s it, it’s over, they’re moving to opposite ends of the country and getting restraining orders and they hate each other. But that’s obviously not the case. We’re still going to see Dan, and Phil, and danandphil. I think we’re just going to see more of a 2014-2015 esque style of uploading. Where they focus primarily on their own channels and their own solo content, with the occasional collab thrown into the mix.
